alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Lakeland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
